description: Host Utilization by day comparing week over week in a two week span

panels.description: Average memory utilization for physical machines

targets.rawSql:
WITH data as (
   SELECT m.time
          ,avg(m.utilization) AS avg_util
      FROM entity e
      JOIN metric m ON m.entity_oid = e.oid
       AND m.entity_hash = e.hash
       AND m.type = 'MEM'
       AND e.type = 'PHYSICAL_MACHINE'
       AND m.time BETWEEN ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') AND ($__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ)
       AND ($__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day',$__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen)
       AND CASE WHEN ARRAY[ [[Group]] ] = ARRAY[ '0' ] THEN true ELSE (e.scope && ARRAY[ [[Group]] ]::bigint[]) END
     GROUP BY 1
)

SELECT CASE WHEN time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day' AND $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day' THEN date_trunc('day', time + INTERVAL '7 DAY') ELSE date_trunc('day', time) END as "time"
      ,avg(avg_util) FILTER (WHERE $__timeFilter(time)) as "Current Week"
      ,avg(avg_util) FILTER (WHERE time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day' AND $__timeTo()::TIMESTAMPTZ - interval '7 day') as "Previous Week"
  FROM data
 GROUP BY 1

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Memory Utilization - Week over Week by Day

panels.title: Physical Machine Avg Net Throughput Utilization - Week over Week by Day

list.definition: select name as __text, oid as __value from entity where entity.type = 'GROUP' and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) and $__timeTo() >= first_seen group by name, oid order by 1
list.name: Group
list.query: select name as __text, oid as __value from entity where entity.type = 'GROUP' and ($__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) OVERLAPS (first_seen, last_seen) and $__timeTo() >= first_seen group by name, oid order by 1

title: Physical Machine Utilization Week Over Week by Day
